message.content:
Genetic Algorithms, Theory. 

Genetic Algorithms is the most related sub-category as the paper discusses the relative importance of mutation and crossover in GAs and proposes an adaptive mechanism for controlling the use of crossover in an EA. 

Theory is also relevant as the paper explores the behavior of the adaptive mechanism in different situations and presents an improvement to the mechanism. The paper also discusses the difficulty in deciding which form of crossover to use and the need for self-adaptive EAs.
